ingredients.item: 320g pack frozen Puff Pastry Sheet defrosted

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6.
Unroll the pastry sheet, place on a large baking tray upside down and remove the plastic film.
Melt the butter in a frying pan, add the onions and fry for 4-5 minutes until golden. Stir in the chutney and mix through. Spread over the pastry, leaving a 2cm border around the edges.

Add the tomatoes and sprinkle over the cheese and thyme. Bring up the edges of the pastry. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes until the pastry has puffed up and the tomatoes have softened. Serve with a mixed green salad.
